channel.title: Suggestion: Please read to find out
channel.description:
I have been registered for a few months and i am wondering if you all could update the site and add a few things, if possible. The following things i think we be helpful is: Areas that provide tutorials about java, c++, scar, web design. If you would add those categories, that would probably make people talk about your site better i am not saying that you have to add themi just think it would help. :)
Thank you

item.title: Suggestion: Please read to find out
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

SCAR tutorials: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,6.0.html
Java tutorials: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,25.0.html
Web tutorials: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,39.0.html
CPP tutorials: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,26.0.html

For the last 3 links, if someone has a tutorial to post… they will post it there.

@ Your poll… Why would you want topics >35 deleted in 10 days? That most likely means that the topic is active, a lot of important/unique/entertaining posts have a high count of posts.

Also I believe in archiving, to see progress… ie.

  • io9 was a fat ass that generally just got picked on
  • he’s still a fat ass that probably still gets picked on, but he now shows java knowledge

Read full topic
